SELECT TSDT.SALE_DATE, TMT.TBL_CD, TMT.TBL_NM,
SUM(TSDT.REAL_SALE_CNT) AS REAL_SALE_CNT, SUM((TSDT.GUEST_CNT_1+GUEST_CNT_2)) AS GUEST_CNT, SUM(TSDT.TOT_SALE_AMT) AS TOT_SALE_AMT, SUM(TSDT.TOT_DC_AMT) AS TOT_DC_AMT, SUM(TSDT.TOT_TIP_AMT) AS TOT_TIP_AMT, SUM(TSDT.REAL_SALE_AMT) AS REAL_SALE_AMT
FROM TB_MS_TABLE_GROUP TMTG , TB_MS_TABLE TMT , TB_SL_DAILY_TABLE TSDT WHERE TMTG.TBL_GRP_CD = TMT.TBL_GRP_CD AND TMT.TBL_CD = TSDT.TBL_CD
AND TMTG.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
AND TSDT.SALE_DATE >= #{startDate} AND TSDT.SALE_DATE <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY TSDT.SALE_DATE, TMT.TBL_CD, TMT.TBL_NM ORDER BY TSDT.SALE_DATE DESC, TMT.TBL_CD, TMT.TBL_NM
